messages.title: Your Choice on Thursday
messages.content: Liberal Democrat MPs who champion their communities and will stand up for our NHS. OR Conservative MPs who are backing heartless cuts to our NHS services.

messages.title: A Liberal Democrat Vote on Thursday
messages.content: A Liberal Democrat vote on Thursday will give our NHS the boost it needs.

messages.title: Everyone knows Labour can’t win in this area on Thursday.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The Liberal Democrats have pledged to increase income tax by a penny for every earner to fund a £6bn-a-year cash injection for the NHS and social care.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Everyone knows Labour can’t win in this area on Thursday.

issues.health: Liberal Democrat MPs who champion their communities and will stand up for our NHS. Tory cuts have left the NHS on the brink of collapse, says shocking report.

community.content: Liberal Democrat MPs who champion their communities and will stand up for our NHS.

quotes.text: The Liberal Democrats have pledged to increase income tax by a penny for every earner to fund a £6bn-a-year cash injection for the NHS and social care.
Tory cuts have left NHS on the brink of collapse, says shocking report.
The Tory manifesto says, in effect, that people who need care in old age will have to pay for every penny of it – no matter how big the costs.
